column1: # This section displays a graph of daily visits to highcharts.com
# The time frame covered is from September 5, 2010 to October 5, 2010
# The graph is divided into two segments: All Visits and New Visitors
# Each row in the graph represents a day of the week, with the corresponding number of visits
# This section displays a table of daily visits to highcharts.com
# The table is divided into two segments: Visits and New Visits
# Each row in the table represents a day, with the corresponding number of visits
# The table also includes the percentage of total visits for each day
